replit.md.content:
# Overview

This is a modern e-commerce web application for Ar√ßelik, a Turkish home appliance brand. The application features a product catalog with categories like refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, and built-in appliances. It includes shopping cart functionality, product search, campaigns section, and corporate information pages. The project is built as a full-stack application with a React frontend and Express.js backend, designed to showcase home appliances with Turkish content and branding.

## Recent Changes (Aug 19, 2025)
- **Database Migration Complete**: Successfully migrated from MemStorage to DatabaseStorage for persistent data
- **Slider Management**: All slider settings (image upload, show/hide) now persist in database
- **Homepage Product Selection**: Featured and popular product selections survive server restarts
- **Admin Panel Fixed**: Categories, navigation, and product management now working with database
- **Authentication Restored**: Test admin user created (emreabd123@gmail.com / emre123)

# User Preferences

Preferred communication style: Simple, everyday language.

# System Architecture

## Frontend Architecture
- **Framework**: React 18 with TypeScript for type safety and modern development
- **Routing**: Wouter for lightweight client-side routing
- **UI Components**: Shadcn/ui component library built on Radix UI primitives
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom CSS variables for theming
- **State Management**: TanStack Query (React Query) for server state management and caching
- **Build Tool**: Vite for fast development and optimized production builds

## Backend Architecture
- **Runtime**: Node.js with Express.js framework
- **Language**: TypeScript with ES modules for modern JavaScript features
- **API Design**: RESTful API structure with route handlers in `/server/routes.ts`
- **Data Storage**: In-memory storage implementation with interface for future database integration
- **Development**: Hot module replacement and middleware for request logging

## Data Storage Solutions
- **ORM**: Drizzle ORM configured for PostgreSQL with Neon Database
- **Schema**: Shared TypeScript schema definitions in `/shared/schema.ts`
- **Tables**: Users, products, and cart items with proper relationships
- **Validation**: Zod schemas for runtime validation of API inputs and outputs
- **Current Implementation**: Memory-based storage with sample data for development

## Authentication and Authorization
- **Session Management**: Basic session structure prepared with connect-pg-simple for PostgreSQL sessions
- **User Schema**: Defined but not fully implemented in current iteration
- **Security**: Express middleware configured for JSON parsing and CORS handling

## External Dependencies
- **Database**: Neon Database (PostgreSQL) configured through Drizzle
- **UI Components**: Radix UI primitives for accessible component foundations
- **Development**: Replit-specific plugins for development environment integration
- **Fonts**: Google Fonts integration (DM Sans, Geist Mono, Architects Daughter, Fira Code)
- **Icons**: Lucide React for consistent iconography
- **Validation**: Zod for schema validation and type inference
- **Date Handling**: date-fns for date manipulation and formatting

√áerez Politikasƒ±

1. √áerez Nedir?

√áerezler (cookies), bir web sitesini ziyaret ettiƒüinizde bilgisayarƒ±nƒ±za veya mobil cihazƒ±nƒ±za kaydedilen k√º√ß√ºk metin dosyalarƒ±dƒ±r. Bu dosyalar, web sitesinin d√ºzg√ºn √ßalƒ±≈ümasƒ±nƒ± saƒülar ve kullanƒ±cƒ± deneyimini iyile≈ütirir.

2. √áerez T√ºrleri

Zorunlu √áerezler

Web sitesinin temel i≈ülevlerini yerine getirmesi i√ßin gerekli √ßerezlerdir. Bu √ßerezler olmadan site d√ºzg√ºn √ßalƒ±≈üamaz.

  • Oturum y√∂netimi √ßerezleri
  • G√ºvenlik √ßerezleri
  • Alƒ±≈üveri≈ü sepeti √ßerezleri

Performans √áerezleri

Web sitesinin performansƒ±nƒ± √∂l√ßmek ve iyile≈ütirmek i√ßin kullanƒ±lan √ßerezlerdir.

  • Sayfa g√∂r√ºnt√ºleme istatistikleri
  • Site kullanƒ±m analitiƒüi
  • Hata raporlama

ƒ∞≈ülevsellik √áerezleri

Kullanƒ±cƒ± deneyimini ki≈üiselle≈ütirmek i√ßin kullanƒ±lan √ßerezlerdir.

  • Dil tercihlerinizi hatƒ±rlama
  • Kullanƒ±cƒ± ayarlarƒ±nƒ± saklama
  • Ki≈üiselle≈ütirilmi≈ü i√ßerik g√∂sterimi

Hedefleme/Reklamcƒ±lƒ±k √áerezleri

Size uygun reklamlar g√∂stermek i√ßin kullanƒ±lan √ßerezlerdir.

  • ƒ∞lgi alanlarƒ±nƒ±za g√∂re reklam g√∂sterimi
  • Sosyal medya entegrasyonu
  • √ú√ß√ºnc√º taraf reklam aƒülarƒ±

3. √áerez Kullanƒ±m Ama√ßlarƒ±mƒ±z

Ender Ar√ßelik olarak √ßerezleri a≈üaƒüƒ±daki ama√ßlarla kullanƒ±yoruz:

  • Web sitesinin g√ºvenli ve d√ºzg√ºn √ßalƒ±≈ümasƒ±nƒ± saƒülamak
  • Kullanƒ±cƒ± tercihlerini hatƒ±rlamak
  • Site performansƒ±nƒ± analiz etmek ve iyile≈ütirmek
  • Ki≈üiselle≈ütirilmi≈ü i√ßerik ve √∂neriler sunmak
  • M√º≈üteri hizmetleri kalitesini artƒ±rmak
  • Pazarlama faaliyetlerini optimize etmek

4. √áerez Y√∂netimi

√áerezleri kontrol etmek i√ßin tarayƒ±cƒ± ayarlarƒ±nƒ±zƒ± kullanabilirsiniz. √áoƒüu tarayƒ±cƒ± √ßerezleri otomatik olarak kabul eder, ancak isterseniz bunu deƒüi≈ütirebilirsiniz.

Pop√ºler Tarayƒ±cƒ±larda √áerez Ayarlarƒ±:

  • Chrome: Ayarlar ‚Üí Gizlilik ve g√ºvenlik ‚Üí √áerezler ve diƒüer site verileri
  • Firefox: Ayarlar ‚Üí Gizlilik ve G√ºvenlik ‚Üí √áerezler ve Site Verileri
  • Safari: Tercihler ‚Üí Gizlilik ‚Üí √áerezler ve web sitesi verileri
  • Edge: Ayarlar ‚Üí √áerezler ve site izinleri

5. √ú√ß√ºnc√º Taraf √áerezleri

Web sitemizde √º√ß√ºnc√º taraf hizmet saƒülayƒ±cƒ±lar tarafƒ±ndan olu≈üturulan √ßerezler bulunabilir:

  • Google Analytics: Site trafiƒüi ve kullanƒ±m analitiƒüi
  • Sosyal Medya: ƒ∞√ßerik payla≈üƒ±mƒ± ve sosyal medya entegrasyonu
  • √ñdeme Sistemleri: G√ºvenli √∂deme i≈ülemleri

6. √áerezleri Reddetmenin Sonu√ßlarƒ±

√áerezleri reddetmeniz durumunda:

  • Bazƒ± site √∂zellikleri d√ºzg√ºn √ßalƒ±≈ümayabilir
  • Alƒ±≈üveri≈ü sepeti i≈ülevleri etkilenebilir
  • Ki≈üiselle≈ütirilmi≈ü deneyim saƒülanamayabilir
  • Her ziyaretinizde tekrar giri≈ü yapmanƒ±z gerekebilir

7. Veri Saklama S√ºresi

√áerezler t√ºr√ºne g√∂re farklƒ± s√ºrelerde saklanƒ±r:

  • Oturum √ßerezleri: Tarayƒ±cƒ± kapatƒ±ldƒ±ƒüƒ±nda silinir
  • Kalƒ±cƒ± √ßerezler: Belirtilen s√ºre sonunda silinir (1 g√ºn - 2 yƒ±l arasƒ±)
  • G√ºvenlik √ßerezleri: G√ºvenlik ama√ßlƒ± gereken s√ºre boyunca

8. ƒ∞leti≈üim

√áerez politikasƒ± hakkƒ±nda sorularƒ±nƒ±z i√ßin bizimle ileti≈üime ge√ßebilirsiniz:

MADDE 2 ‚Äì KONU

MADDE 3 ‚Äì S√ñZLE≈ûME KONUSU √úR√úN/HIZMET Bƒ∞LGƒ∞LERƒ∞

Satƒ±cƒ± tarafƒ±ndan Alƒ±cƒ±'ya satƒ±lacak mal/hizmetin/√ºr√ºn√ºn;

  • Temel √∂zellikleri (t√ºr√º, miktarƒ±, markasƒ±, modeli, rengi, adedi) √ºr√ºn detay sayfasƒ±nda yer almaktadƒ±r
  • Satƒ±≈ü bedeli √ºr√ºn detay sayfasƒ±nda yer alan fiyattƒ±r
  • √ñdeme ≈üekli ve planƒ± sipari≈ü √∂zet sayfasƒ±nda belirtilmi≈ütir

MADDE 4 ‚Äì GENEL H√úK√úMLER

Alƒ±cƒ±, s√∂zle≈üme konusu √ºr√ºn√ºn temel niteliklerini, satƒ±≈ü fiyatƒ±nƒ± ve √∂deme ≈üeklini incelediƒüini ve elektronik ortamda gerekli teyidi verdiƒüini kabul, beyan ve taahh√ºt eder.

MADDE 5 ‚Äì TESLƒ∞MAT

√úr√ºn sipari≈ü tarihinden itibaren 30 g√ºn i√ßinde teslim edilir. Teslimat s√ºresi, √ºr√ºn√ºn √∂zelliƒüine, tedarik durumuna ve teslimat adresine g√∂re deƒüi≈üiklik g√∂sterebilir.

MADDE 6 ‚Äì CAYMA HAKKI

"use client"

import * as React from "react"
import * as ProgressPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-progress"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Progress = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ProgressPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ProgressPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, value, ...props }, ref) => (
  <ProgressPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "relative h-4 w-full overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-secondary",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <ProgressPrimitive.Indicator
      className="h-full w-full flex-1 bg-primary transition-all"
      style={{ transform: `translateX(-${100 - (value || 0)}%)` }}
    />
  </ProgressPrimitive.Root>
))
Progress.displayName = ProgressPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Progress }

import * as React from "react"
import * as ScrollAreaPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-scroll-area"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const ScrollArea = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, children, ...props }, ref) => (
  <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn("relative overflow-hidden", className)}
    {...props}
  >
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Viewport className="h-full w-full rounded-[inherit]">
      {children}
    </ScrollAreaPrimitive.Viewport>
    <ScrollBar />
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Corner />
  </ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>
))
ScrollArea.displayName = ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root.displayName

const ScrollBar = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>
>(({ className, orientation = "vertical", ...props }, ref) => (
  <ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar
    ref={ref}
    orientation={orientation}
    className={cn(
      "flex touch-none select-none transition-colors",
      orientation === "vertical" &&
        "h-full w-2.5 border-l border-l-transparent p-[1px]",
      orientation === "horizontal" &&
        "h-2.5 flex-col border-t border-t-transparent p-[1px]",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaThumb className="relative flex-1 rounded-full bg-border" />
  </ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>
))
ScrollBar.displayName = ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar.displayName

export { ScrollArea, ScrollBar }

<?php
header('Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, Authorization, X-Requested-With');

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'OPTIONS') {
    http_response_code(200);
    exit();
}

// Get the action from query parameter (for new URL structure: /api/admin.php?action=categories)
$endpoint = $_GET['action'] ?? null;

// If no action in query params, try to parse from URI (for old URL structure: /api/admin/categories)
if (!$endpoint) {
    $requestUri = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
    $path = parse_url($requestUri, PHP_URL_PATH);

    $adminIndex = array_search('admin', $segments);
    $endpoint = $segments[$adminIndex + 1] ?? null;
}

$method = $_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'];

if ($method === 'GET') {
    switch ($endpoint) {
        case 'categories':
            // Admin categories

                ['id' => '4', 'name' => 'ƒ∞leti≈üim', 'url' => '/contact', 'sort_order' => 4]
            ]);
            break;

            // Site settings
            echo json_encode([
                'id' => '1',

php_deployment/api/auth.php.content:
<?php
header('Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, Authorization, X-Requested-With');

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'OPTIONS') {
    http_response_code(200);
    exit();
}

require_once __DIR__ . '/../models/User.php';
require_once __DIR__ . '/../classes/SessionManager.php';
require_once __DIR__ . '/../classes/Validator.php';

$sessionManager = new SessionManager();
$userModel = new User();

// Get the action from query parameter (for new URL structure: /api/auth.php?action=login)
$endpoint = $_GET['action'] ?? null;

// If no action in query params, try to parse from URI (for old URL structure: /api/auth/login)
if (!$endpoint) {
    $requestUri = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
    $path = parse_url($requestUri, PHP_URL_PATH);
    $segments = explode('/', trim($path, '/'));
    
    // Find the endpoint after 'api/auth'
    $apiIndex = array_search('api', $segments);
    $authIndex = array_search('auth', $segments);
    $endpoint = $segments[$authIndex + 1] ?? null;
}

$method = $_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'];
$input = json_decode(file_get_contents('php://input'), true) ?? [];

switch ($endpoint) {
    case 'register':
        if ($method === 'POST') {
            // Rate limiting check (basic)
            $clientIp = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
            
            // Validate required fields (phone is optional)
            $required = ['email', 'password', 'first_name', 'last_name'];
            foreach ($required as $field) {
                if (empty($input[$field])) {
                    http_response_code(400);
                    echo json_encode(['error' => "$field alanƒ± zorunludur"]);
                    exit;
                }
            }
            
            $result = $userModel->createUser($input);
            
            if ($result['error']) {
                http_response_code(400);
                echo json_encode(['error' => $result['message']]);
            } else {
                $sessionManager->login($result['user']['id']);
                http_response_code(201);
                echo json_encode($result['user']);
            }
        } else {
            http_response_code(405);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Method not allowed']);
        }
        break;
        
    case 'login':
        if ($method === 'POST') {
            if (empty($input['emailOrPhone']) || empty($input['password'])) {
                http_response_code(400);
                echo json_encode(['error' => 'E-posta/telefon ve ≈üifre gereklidir']);
                exit;
            }
            
            $result = $userModel->authenticate($input['emailOrPhone'], $input['password']);
            
            if ($result['error']) {
                http_response_code(400);
                echo json_encode(['error' => $result['message']]);
            } else {
                $sessionManager->login($result['user']['id']);
                echo json_encode($result['user']);
            }
        } else {
            http_response_code(405);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Method not allowed']);
        }
        break;
        
    case 'logout':
        if ($method === 'POST') {
            $sessionManager->logout();
            echo json_encode(['message' => '√áƒ±kƒ±≈ü ba≈üarƒ±lƒ±']);
        } else {
            http_response_code(405);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Method not allowed']);
        }
        break;
        
    case 'me':
        if ($method === 'GET') {
            if (!$sessionManager->isLoggedIn()) {
                // Return null for logged out users instead of error
                echo json_encode(null);
                exit;
            }
            
            $userId = $sessionManager->getUserId();
            $user = $userModel->getUserById($userId);
            
            if ($user) {
                echo json_encode($user);
            } else {
                // User session exists but user not found - return null
                echo json_encode(null);
            }
        } else {
            http_response_code(405);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Method not allowed']);
        }
        break;
        
    case 'update-profile':
        if ($method === 'PUT') {
            if (!$sessionManager->isLoggedIn()) {
                http_response_code(401);
                echo json_encode(['error' => 'Not authenticated']);
                exit;
            }
            
            $userId = $sessionManager->getUserId();
            $result = $userModel->updateProfile($userId, $input);
            
            if ($result['error']) {
                http_response_code(400);
                echo json_encode(['error' => $result['message']]);
            } else {
                echo json_encode($result['user']);
            }
        } else {
            http_response_code(405);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Method not allowed']);
        }
        break;
        
    case 'change-password':
        if ($method === 'POST') {
            if (!$sessionManager->isLoggedIn()) {
                http_response_code(401);
                echo json_encode(['error' => 'Not authenticated']);
                exit;
            }
            
            if (empty($input['currentPassword']) || empty($input['newPassword'])) {
                http_response_code(400);
                echo json_encode(['error' => 'Mevcut ve yeni ≈üifre gereklidir']);
                exit;
            }
            
            $userId = $sessionManager->getUserId();
            $result = $userModel->changePassword(
                $userId, 
                $input['currentPassword'], 
                $input['newPassword']
            );
            
            if ($result['error']) {
                http_response_code(400);
                echo json_encode(['error' => $result['message']]);
            } else {
                echo json_encode(['message' => $result['message']]);
            }
        } else {
            http_response_code(405);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Method not allowed']);
        }
        break;
        
    default:
        http_response_code(404);
        echo json_encode(['error' => 'Endpoint not found']);
        break;
}

?>

php_deployment/api/cart.php.content:
<?php
header('Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, Authorization, X-Requested-With');

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'OPTIONS') {
    http_response_code(200);
    exit();
}

require_once __DIR__ . '/../models/Cart.php';
require_once __DIR__ . '/../classes/SessionManager.php';

$sessionManager = new SessionManager();
$cartModel = new Cart();

// Check if user is logged in
$isLoggedIn = $sessionManager->isLoggedIn();
$userId = $isLoggedIn ? $sessionManager->getUserId() : null;
$method = $_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'];

// For POST/PUT/DELETE operations, require authentication
if (in_array($method, ['POST', 'PUT', 'DELETE']) && !$isLoggedIn) {
    http_response_code(401);
    echo json_encode(['error' => 'Not authenticated']);
    exit;
}
$input = json_decode(file_get_contents('php://input'), true) ?? [];

// Parse the request URI
$requestUri = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
$path = parse_url($requestUri, PHP_URL_PATH);
$segments = explode('/', trim($path, '/'));

// Find the endpoint after 'api/cart'
$apiIndex = array_search('api', $segments);
$cartIndex = array_search('cart', $segments);
$endpoint = $segments[$cartIndex + 1] ?? null;

switch ($method) {
    case 'GET':
        if (!$isLoggedIn) {
            // Return empty cart for non-authenticated users
            if ($endpoint === 'count') {
                echo json_encode(['count' => 0]);
            } elseif ($endpoint === 'summary') {
                echo json_encode(['subtotal' => 0, 'tax' => 0, 'total' => 0, 'itemCount' => 0]);
            } else {
                echo json_encode([]);
            }
            break;
        }
        
        if ($endpoint === 'count') {
            // GET /api/cart/count - Get cart item count
            $count = $cartModel->getCartCount($userId);
            echo json_encode(['count' => $count]);
        } elseif ($endpoint === 'summary') {
            // GET /api/cart/summary - Get cart summary
            $summary = $cartModel->getCartSummary($userId);
            echo json_encode($summary);
        } else {
            // GET /api/cart - Get all cart items
            $items = $cartModel->getCartItems($userId);
            echo json_encode($items);
        }
        break;
        
    case 'POST':
        // POST /api/cart - Add item to cart
        if (empty($input['productId'])) {
            http_response_code(400);
            echo json_encode(['error' => '√úr√ºn ID gereklidir']);
            exit;
        }
        
        $productId = $input['productId'];
        $quantity = (int) ($input['quantity'] ?? 1);
        $warranty = $input['warranty'] ?? null;
        
        if ($quantity <= 0) {
            http_response_code(400);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Miktar 0\'dan b√ºy√ºk olmalƒ±dƒ±r']);
            exit;
        }
        
        $result = $cartModel->addItem($userId, $productId, $quantity, $warranty);
        
        if ($result['error']) {
            http_response_code(400);
            echo json_encode(['error' => $result['message']]);
        } else {
            echo json_encode([
                'message' => $result['message'],
                'item' => $result['item']
            ]);
        }
        break;
        
    case 'PUT':
        // PUT /api/cart/{itemId} - Update cart item quantity
        if (!$endpoint) {
            http_response_code(400);
            echo json_encode(['error' => '√ñƒüe ID gereklidir']);
            exit;
        }
        
        if (!isset($input['quantity'])) {
            http_response_code(400);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Miktar gereklidir']);
            exit;
        }
        
        $quantity = (int) $input['quantity'];
        $result = $cartModel->updateQuantity($userId, $endpoint, $quantity);
        
        if ($result['error']) {
            http_response_code(400);
            echo json_encode(['error' => $result['message']]);
        } else {
            echo json_encode([
                'message' => $result['message'],
                'item' => $result['item'] ?? null
            ]);
        }
        break;
        
    case 'DELETE':
        if ($endpoint) {
            // DELETE /api/cart/{itemId} - Remove specific item
            $result = $cartModel->removeItem($userId, $endpoint);
            
            if ($result['error']) {
                http_response_code(400);
                echo json_encode(['error' => $result['message']]);
            } else {
                echo json_encode(['message' => $result['message']]);
            }
        } else {
            // DELETE /api/cart - Clear cart
            $result = $cartModel->clearCart($userId);
            
            if ($result['error']) {
                http_response_code(400);
                echo json_encode(['error' => $result['message']]);
            } else {
                echo json_encode(['message' => $result['message']]);
            }
        }
        break;
        
    default:
        http_response_code(405);
        echo json_encode(['error' => 'Method not allowed']);
        break;
}

?>

php_deployment/api/commission-rates.php.content:
<?php
header('Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS');
header('Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, Authorization, X-Requested-With');

if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'OPTIONS') {
    http_response_code(200);
    exit();
}

require_once __DIR__ . '/../models/CommissionRate.php';

$commissionModel = new CommissionRate();

// Parse the request URI
$requestUri = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
$path = parse_url($requestUri, PHP_URL_PATH);
$segments = explode('/', trim($path, '/'));

$method = $_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'];
$queryParams = $_GET;
$input = json_decode(file_get_contents('php://input'), true) ?? [];

if ($method === 'GET') {
    if (isset($queryParams['calculate'])) {
        // GET /api/commission-rates?calculate=1&amount=1000&bank=Akbank&installments=6
        // Calculate commission for specific amount
        $amount = (float) ($queryParams['amount'] ?? 0);
        $bankName = $queryParams['bank'] ?? '';
        $installments = (int) ($queryParams['installments'] ?? 1);
        
        if ($amount <= 0) {
            http_response_code(400);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Ge√ßerli bir tutar giriniz']);
            exit;
        }
        
        if (empty($bankName)) {
            http_response_code(400);
            echo json_encode(['error' => 'Banka se√ßimi gereklidir']);
            exit;
        }
        
        $calculation = $commissionModel->calculateTotalWithCommission($amount, $bankName, $installments);
        echo json_encode($calculation);
        
    } elseif (isset($queryParams['banks'])) {
        // GET /api/commission-rates?banks=1
        // Get available banks
        $banks = $commissionModel->getAvailableBanks();
        echo json_encode($banks);
        
    } elseif (isset($queryParams['bank'])) {
        // GET /api/commission-rates?bank=Akbank&amount=1000
        // Get installment options for specific bank
        $bankName = $queryParams['bank'];
        $amount = isset($queryParams['amount']) ? (float) $queryParams['amount'] : null;
        
        $options = $commissionModel->getInstallmentOptions($bankName, $amount);
        echo json_encode($options);
        
    } else {
        // GET /api/commission-rates
        // Get all commission rates
        $rates = $commissionModel->getAllRates();
        echo json_encode($rates);
    }
} else {
    http_response_code(405);
    echo json_encode(['error' => 'Method not allowed']);
}

?>

    ],
    [
        'id' => '4a8b9c3d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o6p',

        'description' => 'Fƒ±rƒ±n ve ocak takƒ±mƒ±, modern tasarƒ±m',

    ]
];

// Parse the request URI

$path = parse_url($requestUri, PHP_URL_PATH);
$segments = explode('/', trim($path, '/'));

// Find the endpoint after 'api/products'
$apiIndex = array_search('api', $segments);
$productsIndex = array_search('products', $segments);
$endpoint = $segments[$productsIndex + 1] ?? null;

$method = $_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'];
$queryParams = $_GET;

if ($method === 'GET') {
    if ($endpoint) {
        // GET /api/products/{id} - Get specific product from sample data
        $foundProduct = null;
        foreach ($sampleProducts as $product) {
            if ($product['id'] === $endpoint) {
                $foundProduct = $product;
                break;
            }
        }
        
        if ($foundProduct) {
            echo json_encode($foundProduct);
        } else {
            http_response_code(404);
            echo json_encode(['error' => '√úr√ºn bulunamadƒ±']);
        }
    } else {
        // GET /api/products - Get all products with filters
        $page = (int) ($queryParams['page'] ?? 1);
        $limit = (int) ($queryParams['limit'] ?? 20);
        $category = $queryParams['category'] ?? null;
        $search = $queryParams['search'] ?? null;
        
        if (isset($queryParams['featured'])) {
            // Get featured products
            $featuredProducts = array_filter($sampleProducts, function($p) { return $p['is_featured']; });
            echo json_encode(array_values($featuredProducts));
        } elseif (isset($queryParams['q'])) {
            // Search products
            $searchTerm = strtolower($queryParams['q']);
            $searchResults = array_filter($sampleProducts, function($p) use ($searchTerm) {
                return strpos(strtolower($p['name']), $searchTerm) !== false || 
                       strpos(strtolower($p['description']), $searchTerm) !== false;
            });
            echo json_encode(array_values($searchResults));
        } else {
            // Get paginated products - YENI VERSIYON TEST 2024
            echo json_encode([
                'debug' => 'YENI_VERSIYON_√áALI≈ûIYOR',
                'timestamp' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s'),
                'products' => $sampleProducts
            ]);
        }
    }
} else {
    http_response_code(405);
    echo json_encode(['error' => 'Method not allowed']);
}

?>

VERCEL_DEPLOY.md.content:
# Vercel'e Deploy Etme Rehberi

Bu rehber Ar√ßelik e-ticaret projenizi Vercel'e deploy etmek i√ßin adƒ±m adƒ±m talimatlar i√ßerir.

## üöÄ Deploy Adƒ±mlarƒ±

### 1. Vercel Hesabƒ± ve CLI Kurulumu
```bash
# Vercel CLI'ƒ± global olarak y√ºkleyin
npm i -g vercel

# Vercel'e login olun
vercel login
```

### 2. Proje Hazƒ±rlƒ±ƒüƒ±
A≈üaƒüƒ±daki dosyalar hazƒ±rlanmƒ±≈ütƒ±r:
- ‚úÖ `vercel.json` - Vercel configuration
- ‚úÖ `.env.example` - Environment variables template

### 3. Environment Variables Ayarlama

Vercel Dashboard'da projeniz i√ßin a≈üaƒüƒ±daki environment variables'larƒ± ayarlayƒ±n:

**üî¥ ZORUNLU:**
```
DATABASE_URL=your_neon_database_url
PGHOST=your_neon_host
PGPORT=5432
PGUSER=your_neon_user
PGPASSWORD=your_neon_password
PGDATABASE=your_neon_database
NODE_ENV=production
```

**üü° OPSIYONEL (Kullandƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ±z √∂zelliklere g√∂re):**
```
STRIPE_SECRET_KEY=sk_...
STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=pk_...
TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID=...
TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN=...
TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER=...
SENDGRID_API_KEY=...
SESSION_SECRET=your-secret-key
```

### 4. Deploy Komutlarƒ±

#### ƒ∞lk Deployment:
```bash
# Proje klas√∂r√ºnde
vercel

# Sorulara cevaplar:
# - Link to existing project? N
# - Project name: arcelik-ecommerce (veya istediƒüiniz isim)
# - Directory: ./ (enter)
# - Override settings? N
```

#### Sonraki Deployment'lar:
```bash
# Production deploy
vercel --prod

# Preview deploy (test i√ßin)
vercel
```

### 5. Database Migration
```bash
# Local'de database'i sync etmek i√ßin
npm run db:push
```

### 6. √ñnemli Notlar

**‚úÖ Avantajlar:**
- Otomatik scaling
- Global CDN
- Serverless functions
- Zero-downtime deployments
- Preview URLs her pull request i√ßin

**‚ö†Ô∏è Dikkat Edilmesi Gerekenler:**
- Serverless functions 30 saniye timeout'u var
- Soƒüuk ba≈ülangƒ±√ß (cold start) olabilir
- Dosya boyutu limitleri var (50MB per function)

### 7. Custom Domain (Opsiyonel)
```bash
# Custom domain eklemek i√ßin
vercel domains add yourdomain.com
vercel alias your-deployment-url.vercel.app yourdomain.com
```

### 8. Monitoring ve Logs
- Vercel Dashboard'dan real-time logs g√∂r√ºnt√ºleyebilirsiniz
- Analytics ve performance metrics mevcut
- Error tracking built-in

## üîß Troubleshooting

### Common Issues:

1. **Database Connection Error:**
   - Environment variables'larƒ±n doƒüru ayarlandƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ± kontrol edin
   - DATABASE_URL'in production database'ini g√∂sterdiƒüinden emin olun

2. **Build Error:**
   ```bash
   # Local'de test edin
   npm run build
   npm start
   ```

3. **API Routes Not Working:**
   - `vercel.json` routing configuration'ƒ±nƒ± kontrol edin
   - API endpoints `/api/*` prefix'i ile ba≈ülamalƒ±

### Support:
- Vercel Documentation: https://vercel.com/docs
- Discord Community: https://vercel.com/discord

## üìã Final Checklist

- [ ] Vercel hesabƒ± olu≈üturuldu
- [ ] Environment variables ayarlandƒ±
- [ ] ƒ∞lk deploy ba≈üarƒ±lƒ±
- [ ] Database connection test edildi
- [ ] API endpoints √ßalƒ±≈üƒ±yor
- [ ] Frontend loading yapƒ±yor
- [ ] Admin paneli accessible
- [ ] Payment flow test edildi

Deploy tamamlandƒ±ktan sonra siteniz global olarak eri≈üilebilir olacak!

php_backend/api/index.php.content:
<?php
/**
 * Main API Entry Point
 * Ar√ßelik E-Commerce PHP Backend
 */

// Include configuration and autoloader
require_once __DIR__ . '/../config/config.php';
require_once __DIR__ . '/../config/database.php';

// Include all API route files
require_once __DIR__ . '/routes/auth.php';
require_once __DIR__ . '/routes/products.php';
require_once __DIR__ . '/routes/cart.php';
require_once __DIR__ . '/routes/admin.php';
require_once __DIR__ . '/routes/public.php';
require_once __DIR__ . '/routes/upload.php';

// API Router Class
class APIRouter {
    private $routes = [];
    private $middlewares = [];

    public function addRoute($method, $path, $handler, $middlewares = []) {
        $this->routes[] = [
            'method' => strtoupper($method),
            'path' => $path,
            'handler' => $handler,
            'middlewares' => $middlewares
        ];
    }

    public function get($path, $handler, $middlewares = []) {
        $this->addRoute('GET', $path, $handler, $middlewares);
    }

    public function post($path, $handler, $middlewares = []) {
        $this->addRoute('POST', $path, $handler, $middlewares);
    }

    public function put($path, $handler, $middlewares = []) {
        $this->addRoute('PUT', $path, $handler, $middlewares);
    }

    public function delete($path, $handler, $middlewares = []) {
        $this->addRoute('DELETE', $path, $handler, $middlewares);
    }

    public function run() {
        $requestMethod = $_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'];
        $requestUri = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
        
        // Remove query parameters
        $path = parse_url($requestUri, PHP_URL_PATH);
        
        // Remove /api prefix if present
        $path = preg_replace('/^\/api/', '', $path);
        
        // Find matching route
        foreach ($this->routes as $route) {
            if ($route['method'] === $requestMethod && $this->matchPath($route['path'], $path)) {
                try {
                    // Run middlewares
                    foreach ($route['middlewares'] as $middleware) {
                        if (is_callable($middleware)) {
                            $middleware();
                        }
                    }
                    
                    // Extract parameters
                    $params = $this->extractParams($route['path'], $path);
                    
                    // Call handler
                    if (is_callable($route['handler'])) {
                        call_user_func($route['handler'], $params);
                    }
                    return;
                } catch (Exception $e) {
                    errorResponse('Internal Server Error: ' . $e->getMessage(), 500);
                }
            }
        }
        
        // Route not found
        errorResponse('Endpoint not found', 404);
    }

    private function matchPath($routePath, $requestPath) {
        // Convert route path to regex
        $pattern = preg_replace('/\{[^}]+\}/', '([^/]+)', $routePath);
        $pattern = '/^' . str_replace('/', '\/', $pattern) . '$/';
        
        return preg_match($pattern, $requestPath);
    }

    private function extractParams($routePath, $requestPath) {
        $params = [];
        $routeParts = explode('/', trim($routePath, '/'));
        $requestParts = explode('/', trim($requestPath, '/'));

        for ($i = 0; $i < count($routeParts); $i++) {
            if (preg_match('/\{([^}]+)\}/', $routeParts[$i], $matches)) {
                $paramName = $matches[1];
                $params[$paramName] = $requestParts[$i] ?? null;
            }
        }

        return $params;
    }
}

// Authentication middleware
function requireAuth() {
    if (!isAuthenticated()) {
        errorResponse('Not authenticated', 401);
    }
}

// Admin middleware
function requireAdmin() {
    requireAuth();
    if (!isAdmin()) {
        errorResponse('Admin access required', 403);
    }
}

// Check if user is authenticated
function isAuthenticated() {
    return isset($_SESSION['user_id']) && !empty($_SESSION['user_id']);
}

// Check if user is admin
function isAdmin() {
    return isset($_SESSION['user_role']) && $_SESSION['user_role'] === 'admin';
}

// Get current user ID
function getCurrentUserId() {
    return $_SESSION['user_id'] ?? null;
}

// Get request body as JSON
function getRequestBody() {
    $body = file_get_contents('php://input');
    return json_decode($body, true);
}

// Initialize router
$router = new APIRouter();

// Initialize all routes
initAuthRoutes($router);
initProductRoutes($router);
initCartRoutes($router);
initAdminRoutes($router);
initPublicRoutes($router);
initUploadRoutes($router);

// Run the router
$router->run();
?>

<?php
/**
 * Admin API Routes (Requires Admin Authentication)
 * Converted from Node.js Express to PHP
 */

function initAdminRoutes($router) {
    global $pdo;

    // GET /api/admin/settings
    $router->get('/admin/settings', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        try {
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("SELECT * FROM general_settings LIMIT 1");
            $stmt->execute();
            $settings = $stmt->fetch();

            if (!$settings) {
                // Create default settings if none exist
                $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                    INSERT INTO general_settings (site_title, site_description) 
                    VALUES ('Ar√ßelik', 'T√ºrkiye\'nin √∂nde gelen beyaz e≈üya markasƒ±')
                ");
                $stmt->execute();
                
                $stmt = $pdo->prepare("SELECT * FROM general_settings LIMIT 1");
                $stmt->execute();
                $settings = $stmt->fetch();
            }

            $settings['bank_transfer_enabled'] = (bool)$settings['bank_transfer_enabled'];

            successResponse($settings);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Get admin settings error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Ayarlar getirilemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);

    // PUT /api/admin/settings
    $router->put('/admin/settings', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $data = getRequestBody();
        
        try {
            $updateFields = [];
            $values = [];
            
            $allowedFields = [
                'site_title', 'site_description', 'company_address', 'contact_phone', 
                'contact_email', 'instagram_url', 'whatsapp_url', 'bank_transfer_enabled',
                'bank_name', 'account_holder', 'iban', 'account_number', 'bank_transfer_instructions'
            ];
            
            foreach ($allowedFields as $field) {
                if (isset($data[$field])) {
                    $updateFields[] = "$field = ?";
                    $values[] = $data[$field];
                }
            }
            
            if (empty($updateFields)) {
                errorResponse('G√ºncellenecek alan bulunamadƒ±', 400);
            }
            
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                UPDATE general_settings 
                SET " . implode(', ', $updateFields) . ", updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
            ");
            $stmt->execute($values);
            
            successResponse(['message' => 'Ayarlar g√ºncellendi']);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Update admin settings error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Ayarlar g√ºncellenemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);

    // GET /api/admin/categories
    $router->get('/admin/categories', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        try {
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                SELECT DISTINCT category as name, 'home' as icon
                FROM products 
                ORDER BY category
            ");
            $stmt->execute();
            $categories = $stmt->fetchAll();

            // Add IDs for compatibility
            foreach ($categories as $index => &$category) {
                $category['id'] = (string)($index + 1);
            }

            successResponse($categories);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Get admin categories error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Kategoriler getirilemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);

    // GET /api/admin/sliders
    $router->get('/admin/sliders', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        try {
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                SELECT id, title, subtitle, image, mobile_image, link_url, 
                       link_text, display_order, is_active, created_at, updated_at
                FROM sliders 
                ORDER BY display_order ASC, created_at DESC
            ");
            $stmt->execute();
            $sliders = $stmt->fetchAll();

            foreach ($sliders as &$slider) {
                $slider['is_active'] = (bool)$slider['is_active'];
            }

            successResponse($sliders);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Get admin sliders error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Sliderlar getirilemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);

    // POST /api/admin/sliders
    $router->post('/admin/sliders', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $data = getRequestBody();
        
        if (empty($data['title']) || empty($data['image'])) {
            errorResponse('Ba≈ülƒ±k ve resim gereklidir', 400);
        }

        try {
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                INSERT INTO sliders (title, subtitle, image, mobile_image, link_url, 
                                   link_text, display_order, is_active) 
                VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
            ");
            $stmt->execute([
                $data['title'],
                $data['subtitle'] ?? null,
                $data['image'],
                $data['mobile_image'] ?? null,
                $data['link_url'] ?? null,
                $data['link_text'] ?? null,
                $data['display_order'] ?? 0,
                $data['is_active'] ?? true
            ]);

            successResponse(['message' => 'Slider eklendi', 'id' => $pdo->lastInsertId()]);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Create admin slider error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Slider eklenemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);

    // PUT /api/admin/sliders/{id}
    $router->put('/admin/sliders/{id}', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $sliderId = $params['id'];
        $data = getRequestBody();
        
        try {
            $updateFields = [];
            $values = [];
            
            $allowedFields = ['title', 'subtitle', 'image', 'mobile_image', 'link_url', 'link_text', 'display_order', 'is_active'];
            
            foreach ($allowedFields as $field) {
                if (isset($data[$field])) {
                    $updateFields[] = "$field = ?";
                    $values[] = $data[$field];
                }
            }
            
            if (empty($updateFields)) {
                errorResponse('G√ºncellenecek alan bulunamadƒ±', 400);
            }
            
            $values[] = $sliderId;
            
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                UPDATE sliders 
                SET " . implode(', ', $updateFields) . ", updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 
                WHERE id = ?
            ");
            $stmt->execute($values);
            
            if ($stmt->rowCount() === 0) {
                errorResponse('Slider bulunamadƒ±', 404);
            }
            
            successResponse(['message' => 'Slider g√ºncellendi']);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Update admin slider error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Slider g√ºncellenemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);

    // DELETE /api/admin/sliders/{id}
    $router->delete('/admin/sliders/{id}', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $sliderId = $params['id'];
        
        try {
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("DELETE FROM sliders WHERE id = ?");
            $stmt->execute([$sliderId]);
            
            if ($stmt->rowCount() === 0) {
                errorResponse('Slider bulunamadƒ±', 404);
            }
            
            successResponse(['message' => 'Slider silindi']);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Delete admin slider error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Slider silinemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);

    // GET /api/admin/navigation
    $router->get('/admin/navigation', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        try {
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                SELECT id, label, path, is_active, order_index, created_at, updated_at
                FROM navigation_items 
                ORDER BY order_index ASC, label ASC
            ");
            $stmt->execute();
            $items = $stmt->fetchAll();

            foreach ($items as &$item) {
                $item['is_active'] = (bool)$item['is_active'];
            }

            successResponse($items);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Get admin navigation error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Navigasyon √∂ƒüeleri getirilemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);

    // GET /api/admin/homepage-sections
    $router->get('/admin/homepage-sections', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        try {
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                SELECT id, section_type, title, is_active, display_order, created_at, updated_at
                FROM homepage_sections 
                ORDER BY display_order ASC, section_type ASC
            ");
            $stmt->execute();
            $sections = $stmt->fetchAll();

            foreach ($sections as &$section) {
                $section['is_active'] = (bool)$section['is_active'];
            }

            successResponse($sections);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Get admin homepage sections error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Ana sayfa b√∂l√ºmleri getirilemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);

    // GET /api/admin/orders
    $router->get('/admin/orders', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        try {
            $limit = min((int)($_GET['limit'] ?? 50), 100);
            $offset = max((int)($_GET['offset'] ?? 0), 0);
            $status = $_GET['status'] ?? '';

            $where = '';
            $params = [];
            
            if (!empty($status)) {
                $where = 'WHERE status = ?';
                $params[] = $status;
            }

            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                SELECT 
                    o.id, o.order_number, o.status, o.payment_method, o.payment_status,
                    o.total_amount, o.tracking_code, o.created_at, o.updated_at,
                    u.first_name, u.last_name, u.email
                FROM orders o
                JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.id
                $where
                ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
                LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
            ");
            
            $params[] = $limit;
            $params[] = $offset;
            $stmt->execute($params);
            $orders = $stmt->fetchAll();

            foreach ($orders as &$order) {
                $order['total_amount'] = (float)$order['total_amount'];
            }

            successResponse(['orders' => $orders]);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Get admin orders error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Sipari≈üler getirilemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAdmin']);
}
?>

<?php
/**
 * Authentication API Routes
 * Converted from Node.js Express to PHP
 */

function initAuthRoutes($router) {
    global $pdo;

    // POST /api/auth/register
    $router->post('/auth/register', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $data = getRequestBody();
        
        // Validation
        $required = ['username', 'password', 'email', 'phone', 'firstName', 'lastName'];
        foreach ($required as $field) {
            if (empty($data[$field])) {
                errorResponse("$field alanƒ± gereklidir", 400);
            }
        }

        // Validate email
        if (!filter_var($data['email'], FILTER_VALIDATE_EMAIL)) {
            errorResponse('Ge√ßerli bir email adresi giriniz', 400);
        }

        // Validate phone (Turkish format)
        if (!preg_match('/^(\+90|0)?[5][0-9]{9}$/', $data['phone'])) {
            errorResponse('Ge√ßerli bir telefon numarasƒ± giriniz', 400);
        }

        try {
            // Check if user already exists
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("SELECT id FROM users WHERE email = ? OR phone = ? OR username = ?");
            $stmt->execute([$data['email'], $data['phone'], $data['username']]);
            
            if ($stmt->fetch()) {
                errorResponse('Bu email, telefon veya kullanƒ±cƒ± adƒ± zaten kullanƒ±lƒ±yor', 409);
            }

            // Hash password
            $hashedPassword = hashPassword($data['password']);
            
            // Generate verification token
            $verificationToken = bin2hex(random_bytes(32));
            $verificationExpires = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('+24 hours'));
            
            // Insert user
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                INSERT INTO users (username, password, email, phone, first_name, last_name, 
                                 email_verification_token, email_verification_expires, tc_kimlik) 
                VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
            ");
            
            $stmt->execute([
                $data['username'],
                $hashedPassword,
                $data['email'],
                $data['phone'],
                $data['firstName'],
                $data['lastName'],
                $verificationToken,
                $verificationExpires,
                $data['tcKimlik'] ?? null
            ]);

            $userId = $pdo->lastInsertId();
            
            // TODO: Send verification email
            // sendVerificationEmail($data['email'], $verificationToken);
            
            successResponse([
                'message' => 'Kayƒ±t ba≈üarƒ±lƒ±. Email adresinizi doƒürulayƒ±n.',
                'userId' => $userId
            ]);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Registration error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Kayƒ±t i≈ülemi ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±z', 500);
        }
    });

    // POST /api/auth/login
    $router->post('/auth/login', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $data = getRequestBody();
        
        if (empty($data['email']) || empty($data['password'])) {
            errorResponse('Email ve ≈üifre gereklidir', 400);
        }

        try {
            // Find user
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = ? OR phone = ?");
            $stmt->execute([$data['email'], $data['email']]);
            $user = $stmt->fetch();

            if (!$user || !verifyPassword($data['password'], $user['password'])) {
                errorResponse('Girilen bilgilerde hata var', 401);
            }

            // Create session
            session_regenerate_id(true);
            $_SESSION['user_id'] = $user['id'];
            $_SESSION['user_role'] = $user['role'];
            $_SESSION['user_email'] = $user['email'];

            // Update last login
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("UPDATE users SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = ?");
            $stmt->execute([$user['id']]);

            // Return user data (excluding password)
            unset($user['password']);
            unset($user['email_verification_token']);
            
            successResponse([
                'user' => $user,
                'message' => 'Giri≈ü ba≈üarƒ±lƒ±'
            ]);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Login error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Giri≈ü i≈ülemi ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±z', 500);
        }
    });

    // POST /api/auth/logout
    $router->post('/auth/logout', function($params) {
        session_destroy();
        successResponse(['message' => '√áƒ±kƒ±≈ü ba≈üarƒ±lƒ±']);
    }, ['requireAuth']);

    // GET /api/auth/me
    $router->get('/auth/me', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        try {
            $userId = getCurrentUserId();
            
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                SELECT id, username, email, phone, first_name, last_name, 
                       profile_image_url, role, email_verified, created_at, updated_at
                FROM users WHERE id = ?
            ");
            $stmt->execute([$userId]);
            $user = $stmt->fetch();

            if (!$user) {
                errorResponse('Kullanƒ±cƒ± bulunamadƒ±', 404);
            }

            successResponse(['user' => $user]);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Get user error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Kullanƒ±cƒ± bilgisi alƒ±namadƒ±', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAuth']);

    // PUT /api/auth/update-profile
    $router->put('/auth/update-profile', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $data = getRequestBody();
        $userId = getCurrentUserId();
        
        try {
            $updateFields = [];
            $values = [];
            
            $allowedFields = ['first_name', 'last_name', 'phone', 'profile_image_url'];
            
            foreach ($allowedFields as $field) {
                if (isset($data[$field])) {
                    $updateFields[] = "$field = ?";
                    $values[] = $data[$field];
                }
            }
            
            if (empty($updateFields)) {
                errorResponse('G√ºncellenecek alan bulunamadƒ±', 400);
            }
            
            $values[] = $userId;
            
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                UPDATE users 
                SET " . implode(', ', $updateFields) . ", updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 
                WHERE id = ?
            ");
            $stmt->execute($values);
            
            successResponse(['message' => 'Profil g√ºncellendi']);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Update profile error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Profil g√ºncellenemedi', 500);
        }
    }, ['requireAuth']);

    // POST /api/auth/forgot-password
    $router->post('/auth/forgot-password', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $data = getRequestBody();
        
        if (empty($data['email'])) {
            errorResponse('Email adresi gereklidir', 400);
        }

        try {
            // Find user
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("SELECT id, email, first_name FROM users WHERE email = ?");
            $stmt->execute([$data['email']]);
            $user = $stmt->fetch();

            if ($user) {
                // Generate reset token
                $resetToken = bin2hex(random_bytes(32));
                $expiresAt = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', strtotime('+1 hour'));
                
                // Save reset token
                $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                    INSERT INTO password_reset_tokens (user_id, token, expires_at) 
                    VALUES (?, ?, ?)
                ");
                $stmt->execute([$user['id'], $resetToken, $expiresAt]);
                
                // TODO: Send reset email
                // sendPasswordResetEmail($user['email'], $resetToken);
            }
            
            // Always return success for security (don't reveal if email exists)
            successResponse([
                'message' => 'Eƒüer email adresiniz sistemde kayƒ±tlƒ± ise, ≈üifre sƒ±fƒ±rlama linki g√∂nderildi.'
            ]);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Forgot password error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('ƒ∞≈ülem ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±z', 500);
        }
    });

    // POST /api/auth/reset-password
    $router->post('/auth/reset-password', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $data = getRequestBody();
        
        if (empty($data['token']) || empty($data['password'])) {
            errorResponse('Token ve yeni ≈üifre gereklidir', 400);
        }

        try {
            // Find valid token
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                SELECT prt.*, u.id as user_id 
                FROM password_reset_tokens prt
                JOIN users u ON prt.user_id = u.id
                WHERE prt.token = ? AND prt.expires_at > NOW() AND prt.used = 0
            ");
            $stmt->execute([$data['token']]);
            $tokenData = $stmt->fetch();

            if (!$tokenData) {
                errorResponse('Ge√ßersiz veya s√ºresi dolmu≈ü token', 400);
            }

            // Update password
            $hashedPassword = hashPassword($data['password']);
            
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("UPDATE users SET password = ?, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = ?");
            $stmt->execute([$hashedPassword, $tokenData['user_id']]);
            
            // Mark token as used
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("UPDATE password_reset_tokens SET used = 1 WHERE id = ?");
            $stmt->execute([$tokenData['id']]);
            
            successResponse(['message' => '≈ûifre ba≈üarƒ±yla g√ºncellendi']);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Reset password error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('≈ûifre sƒ±fƒ±rlama ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±z', 500);
        }
    });

    // GET /api/auth/verify-email
    $router->get('/auth/verify-email', function($params) {
        global $pdo;
        
        $token = $_GET['token'] ?? '';
        
        if (empty($token)) {
            errorResponse('Doƒürulama token\'ƒ± gereklidir', 400);
        }

        try {
            // Find user with valid token
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                SELECT id FROM users 
                WHERE email_verification_token = ? 
                AND email_verification_expires > NOW() 
                AND email_verified = 0
            ");
            $stmt->execute([$token]);
            $user = $stmt->fetch();

            if (!$user) {
                errorResponse('Ge√ßersiz veya s√ºresi dolmu≈ü doƒürulama token\'ƒ±', 400);
            }

            // Verify email
            $stmt = $pdo->prepare("
                UPDATE users 
                SET email_verified = 1, 
                    email_verification_token = NULL, 
                    email_verification_expires = NULL,
                    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
                WHERE id = ?
            ");
            $stmt->execute([$user['id']]);
            
            successResponse(['message' => 'Email ba≈üarƒ±yla doƒürulandƒ±']);
            
        } catch (Exception $e) {
            error_log("Email verification error: " . $e->getMessage());
            errorResponse('Email doƒürulama ba≈üarƒ±sƒ±z', 500);
        }
    });
}
?>
